title: Saigon Under Attack. . .
description: (continuation of title) Member of the American Ninth Division speaking over radio to command post.  The smoke and flames are rising from the Cholon section which has been set afire by the ARVIN troops in order to \"flush out\" the enemy.  Some fires were set by rockets fired by U.S. helicopter gunships north of the \"Y\" Bridge on the southern side of Saigon
